sentences.en: Barring a miracle, he won’t walk again.
sentences.cn: 除非出现奇迹，他是不可能再行走了。

sentences.en: Barring accidents, I believe they will succeed.
sentences.cn: 不出意外的话，我相信他们会成功的。
除非有意外事故, 我会一定到场的.

sentences.en: Barring accidents, we should arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 除非有意外情况，我们应可按时到达。

sentences.en: Barring rum, his match were never seen.
sentences.cn: 除了朗姆酒, 谁都不是他的对手.

sentences.en: Barring special circumstances, the plane will arrive on schedule.
sentences.cn: 如无特殊情况, 飞机将准时到达.

sentences.en: Barring strong headwinds, the plane will arrive on schedule.
sentences.cn: 如果不是猛烈的顶头风, 飞机会准点到达的.

sentences.en: Barring the boss, we all went out for drinks on Friday.
sentences.cn: 除了老板, 我们星期五都出去喝酒了.

sentences.en: Barring women from competing and halting wars during the Games.
sentences.cn: 禁止妇女比赛及奥运会期间停止战争.

sentences.en: He stepped in front of her, barring her way.
sentences.cn: 他走到她前面，挡住了她的去路。

sentences.en: Most credit agencies run a 15-year blacklist effectively barring bankrupts from receiving credit.
sentences.cn: 大多数信贷机构都有一份为期15年的黑名单，以有效阻止破产者得到贷款。

sentences.en: Nobody else knows barring you and me.
Sorry, the subscriber you dialed has set barring of incoming calls.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 您拨打的用户已设置呼入限制.

sentences.en: The products ( barring using ) sale and kind is a top priority.
sentences.cn: 产品 ( 不包括家用 ) 销售额和种类居全球排名前列.

sentences.en: We shall return at midnight, barring accidents.
sentences.cn: 除非有意外事故,我们将于午夜回来.

sentences.en: We should arrive in half an hour, barring hold - ups.
sentences.cn: 若无交通阻塞,我们半小时后可到达.

phrases.tran_cn: 盘车装置；曲轴变位传动装置；曲柄移位装置
